quality_assessment: Well-structured error reference with good coverage of common errors. Missing some newer error types and MkDocs Material visual enhancements.

issues.fix_suggestion: Add section documenting 'Worktree merge conflict for agent {agent_id} on branch {branch}' error with causes and resolution steps
Add section documenting commit validation failures when commit_required: true is set but no commit was made
Add section for 'Failed to load work items from {path}' error with common causes (invalid JSON, file permissions)
Add section for 'JSON path expression invalid: {expression}' with JSONPath syntax guidance

issues.description: References CLAUDE.md file which users cannot access
issues.current_content: For details on concurrent resume protection, see "Concurrent Resume Protection (Spec 140)" in the CLAUDE.md file.
issues.should_be: Reference should point to user-accessible documentation or explain the behavior inline
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace the CLAUDE.md reference with a link to the checkpoint-and-resume documentation page or explain the concurrent resume protection mechanism inline

issues.description: Document lacks MkDocs Material visual enhancements
issues.fix_suggestion: Add admonitions for tips/warnings, use tabs for grouping related commands, and consider adding code annotations for complex examples

issues.description: No mention of error codes system for programmatic error handling
issues.fix_suggestion: Consider adding a brief note about error codes (1000-9999 ranges) for users who need to handle errors programmatically

positive_aspects: Comprehensive quick reference table with all documented errors
Clear structure with consistent format for each error
Good coverage of common causes and solutions
Includes source references for composition errors (good practice)
Anchor links in quick reference for easy navigation
Solutions are actionable with specific commands
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions to highlight important warnings or tips
Add tabbed sections for grouping CLI commands vs manual resolution steps
Include cross-references to related documentation pages (DLQ, checkpoints, worktrees)
Add a section on interpreting error codes for advanced users
Consider adding Mermaid diagrams for error recovery flowcharts
Add links to the mapreduce/checkpoint-and-resume.md page for checkpoint-related errors

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
